description:
EASY is a young woman with long, black hair, and violet eyes. Apparently at odds with http://anidb.net/ch83939 [Murasaki], she is responsible for the http://anidb.net/ch86430 [Ends], an opposing force similar in origin to the http://anidb.net/ch86429 [Drifters]. She primarily uses her laptop to keep tabs on the battles taking place in the other world. In the corridor, she is associated with and accompanied by darkness.
Source: Wikipedia
name: EASY
